verses.verse: Now <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H2204>old<s%> and <S%H935>stricken<s%> in <S%H3117>years<s%>; and they <S%H3680>covered<s%> him with <S%H899>clothes<s%>, but he gat no <S%H3179>heat<s%>.

So they <S%H1245>sought<s%> for a <S%H3303>fair<s%> <S%H5291>damsel<s%> throughout all the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H49>Abishag<s%> the <S%H7767>Shunammite<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> her to the <S%H4428>king<s%>.

And his <S%H1>father<s%> had not <S%H6087>displeased<s%> him at any <S%H3117>time<s%> in <S%H559>saying<s%>, Why hast thou done <S%H6213>so<s%>? and he was also a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H3205>man<s%>; and he was born <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%>.

But <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%>, and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, and <S%H8096>Shimei<s%>, and <S%H7472>Rei<s%>, and the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> that belonged to <S%H1732>David<s%>, were not with <S%H138>Adonijah<s%>.

And <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> <S%H2076>slew<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen<s%> and <S%H4806>fatlings<s%> by the <S%H68>stone<s%> of <S%H2120>Zoheleth<s%>, which is <S%H681>beside<s%> <S%H5883>En-rogel<s%>; and he <S%H7121>called<s%> all his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and all the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%>:

Then <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H1339>Bath-sheba<s%> the <S%H517>mother<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Hast thou not <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2294>Haggith<s%> doth <S%H4427>reign<s%>, and <S%H1732>David<s%> our <S%H113>lord<s%> knoweth it <S%H3045>not<s%>?

Now therefore <S%H3212>come<s%>, let <S%H3289>me<s%>, I pray thee, give thee counsel, that thou mayest <S%H4422>save<s%> thine own <S%H5315>life<s%>, and the <S%H5315>life<s%> of thy <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>.

Go <S%H3212><s%> and get thee <S%H935>in<s%> unto <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H113>him<s%>, Didst not thou, my lord, O <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H7650>swear<s%> unto thy <S%H519>handmaid<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3588>Assuredly<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3427>me<s%>, and he shall sit upon my <S%H3678>throne<s%>? why then doth <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> <S%H4427>reign<s%>?
Behold <S%H1696><s%>, while thou yet talkest there with the <S%H4428>king<s%>, I also will come <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H4390>thee<s%>, and confirm thy <S%H1697>words<s%>.

And <S%H138>now<s%>, behold, Adonijah <S%H4427>reigneth<s%>; and <S%H113>thou<s%>, my lord the <S%H4428>king<s%>, knowest it <S%H3045>not<s%>:

and he hath <S%H2076>slain<s%> <S%H7794>oxen<s%> and <S%H4806>fatlings<s%> and <S%H6629>sheep<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance<s%>, and hath <S%H7121>called<s%> all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%>; but <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> hath he not <S%H7121>called<s%>.

Otherwise it will come to <S%H113>pass<s%>, when my lord the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H7901>sleep<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%>, that I and my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> shall be counted <S%H2400>offenders<s%>.
And <S%H1696><s%>, lo, while she yet talked with the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%>.

For he is gone <S%H3381>down<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>, and hath <S%H2076>slain<s%> <S%H7794>oxen<s%> and <S%H4806>fatlings<s%> and <S%H6629>sheep<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance<s%>, and hath <S%H7121>called<s%> all the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%>, and <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>; <S%H398>and<s%>, behold, they are eating and <S%H8354>drinking<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, and say, Long <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H138>Adonijah<s%>.

Then <S%H1339>Bath-sheba<s%> <S%H6915>bowed<s%> with her <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and did <S%H7812>obeisance<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Let my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7121>Call<s%> to me <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%>.
